name: Trianghold
description:
Trianghold is a simple game that mixes elements from tower defense and top-down shooter genres. In this game you have to fight other shapes to survive, counting on ally triangles to help you destroy the hordes of shapes.

Your triangle base will automatically attack enemies that enter the field of view giving priority to the closer ones. You can summon allies to help you, they will patrol areas and attack nearby enemies. The attributes of the ally triangles are based on the triangle base, so the stronger you get the stronger your allies will be.

On the bottom of the screen, you'll find a shop from where you can purchase items to increase your attributes, the more you buy the more expensive an attribute will be.

There are 4 types of enemies, in order of appearance in the game:

Mai: No powers, just goes straight to the base

Zuk: Fire Aura - Does DoT to each ally/player surrounding

Yak: Freezing Aura - Slows ally/player surrounding

Kyo: Shield (doubles HP)

Ten: Dash (super speed)

All the enemy superpowers have a chance to occur and a cooldown after each use

As we progress through the waves, the money you get from the enemies increases
